name: angular2-aot-webpack-comparison
description: Angular AOT (Ahead Of Time) offline compilation example with Webpack

scripts.cleanup: rimraf src/app/**/*.ngfactory.ts src/app/**/*.ngstyle.ts src/app/**/*.ngsummary.json build dist
scripts.start: npm run cleanup && npm run ngc && concurrently -r "webpack-dev-server --config webpack.aot.config.js" "node ./bin/ngc-watch.js"
scripts.start-prod: npm run ngc && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run ngc && webpack --config webpack.aot.config.js -p
scripts.build:rollup: npm run cleanup && ngc -p tsconfig-aot.json && rollup -c rollup.config.js && copy ./src/rollup-index.html > ./dist/index.html
scripts.build:aot-ngtools: npm run cleanup &&  NGTOOLS=true webpack --config webpack.aot.config.js -p
scripts.aot: npm run cleanup && npm run ngc && concurrently -r "webpack-dev-server --config webpack.aot.config.js" "node ./bin/ngc-watch.js"
